long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adventure/action platform game where the archer must cross the valley of monsters, where he encounters many challenges. Collect all the stars in each level. Archer Hero is a super fun and challenging 2D side-scroller game in the same style as successful games like Super Mario, Donkey Kong and Sonic. The game features 30 levels that will challenge you to beat it. The designs are very colorful and beautiful!
